summary:
Enhancing Cloud Experience with Blockchain Technology - DeCloud is built to revolutionize remote access by combining the revolutionary aspects of blockchain technology with the potency of sophisticated Remote Desktop Protocols (RDP)

 About De Cloud - DeCloud is an avant-garde solution at the forefront of remote connectivity that combines the revolutionary aspects of blockchain technology with the conventional remote desktop capabilities in a seamless manner. DeCloud is a major advancement in the field of remote access.

 Benefits of DeCloud - We want to provide consumers with the most improved remote desktop experience possible by fusing the strength of state-of-the-art RDP solutions with the security benefits of blockchain.

 DeCloud Tokenomics - Siter we need some info here!

 Our Roadmap - Foundation - Building the Basics

• Launch of DeCloud Website and Social Media Channels

• Development of DeCloud MVP and Beta Testing

• Release of DeCloud Whitepaper

• Announcement of DeCloud Tokenomics and Initial DEX Offering (IDO) Details

• Listing of DeCloud Token (CLOUD) on Uniswap and Other Decentralized

• Launch DeCloud Platform for Remote Access

1

Token and Platform Launch

• DeCloud Token (CLOUD) Introduced as Payment Token

• DeCloud Token Staking and Burning Mechanisms Implemented

• Deployment of DeCloud Token on Centralized Exchanges (CEXs)

• Marketing and awareness campaigns for DeCloud

• Integration of the DeCloud Token into the Remote Desktop Environment

• Growth of the DeCloud Team and Advisors

2

Platform Enhancement and Expansion

• Improvement of Remote Access Services and the DeCloud Platform

• Formation of Strategic Partnerships

• Attending conferences and events in the industry

• Additional DeCloud Token Listing on Notable Centralized Exchanges (CEXs)

3

Scaling and Continuous Improvement

• Extension of Remote Access Services and DeCloud Platform Scaling

• Exploring Prospects and Advancements in the Web3 Domain

• Improving and Optimizing the DeCloud Platform Constantly

• Continuing Marketing and Community Involvement

• Research and Developing for Upcoming Improvements

• Consistent updates, incorporation of user feedback, and features and improvements
